body: So I was just playing CherrylandMC (I'm a Cherry) and I took the TnT from the chest. I went to the monument and no one followed me so I blew up the bridge to stop the Blueberries from getting to the monument and right when all of it blew up I was banned for Team Grief... I AM SO CONFUZZLED!
body_tagged: So I was just playing CherrylandMC (I'm a Cherry) and I took the TnT from the chest. I went to the monument and no one followed me so I blew up the bridge to stop the Blueberries from getting to the monument and right when all of it blew up I was banned for Team Grief... I AM SO CONFUZZLED!
title: I've been banned for no reason....

replies.body:
You can appeal your infraction by emailing support.
support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged:
You can appeal your infraction by emailing support.
support@avicus.net

replies.body:
Hello George!

Please appeal your punishment by emailing support@avicus.net. The forums are not the place for this.

Good luck!
